SEARCH
Package sustech.cs304.entity

Class ChatMessage

java.lang.Object
sustech.cs304.entity.ChatMessage
public class ChatMessage extends Object
Represents a chat message exchanged between users. Contains information such as sender ID, receiver ID, message content, timestamp, and a unique ID.
